raw_text: We evaluated our system on two datasets: the Text Analysis Conference (TAC) track on Knowl edge Base Population (TAC-KBP) (McNamee and Dang, 2009) and the newswire data used by Cucerzan (2007) (Microsoft News Data) .Since our approach relies on supervised learning, we begin by constructing our own trainingcorpus.7 We highlighted 1496 named entity mentions in news documents (from the TAC-KBP document collection) and linked these to entries in a KB derived from Wikipedia info boxes
